validForm.name: Aragorn Son of Arathorn
validForm.message: Let the Lord of the Black Land come forth! Let justice be done upon him!

phoneNumberTooLong.message: Who Now Has The Strength To Stand Against The Armies Of Isengard ... And Mordor?

emptyPhone.message: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
